name: 3-fluoro-4-methoxybenzenesulfonamide

The fluorine atom introduces a significant increase in molecular weight and van der Waals interactions, estimated at around +10°C. The methoxy group introduces additional rigidity and hydrogen bonding potential, estimated at around +5°C. The sulfonamide group introduces additional rigidity and hydrogen bonding potential, estimated at around +10°C.
